html:
Charles MacDonald would feel at home here...
Old MacDonald is the fourth course here at Bandon Dunes. It was built with templates holes from C.B. MacDonald in mind. Template holes are standard design holes across golf courses. You will hear names as Alps, Road, Redan, and Punchbowl, and you will play every one of them here. You will start inland and play with a friendly and easy par four to the Redan hole. Next is the very cool and challenging 'Sahara', with its blind tee shot next to the 'ghost tree'. After you hike up the embankment to the tree, you can then see the valley below and the course in all its glory.
You will play some of the most abundant greens you will ever encounter in golf. But this is a blessing, you may play a hole ten times, and every time it feels like a different hole. As you play in the dunes, you can hear the ocean in the distance but come to it on the intimidating 7th hole. Then it back into the valley for more golf. The 11th is an homage to the Road Hole at St. Andrews, without having to worry about the road or the hotel to drive over. My favorite hole is the 16th that uses the 'Alps' template. The correct play is down the right side, but with bunkers on this side, it is more tempting to stay left. The left side will give you a bind shot in, but with the large greens, it might be the more natural shot. After the round, you will think about all the different ways you could have played a hole. That's why I love this course.
css: .section1 {display: grid;grid-template-columns: 1fr;}.hero-text {font-family:'Courgette';font-size: 3rem;color: white;grid-column: 1/2;grid-row:1/2;justify-self: center;align-self: flex-end;}.section1 picture {grid-column: 1/2;grid-row:1/2;}.container {font-size: 1.25rem;display: flex;flex-direction: column;width: 100%;}.section picture img {border-width: 7px;border-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);border-style: solid;filter: drop-shadow(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 2px 4px);}.section {display: grid;grid-template-columns: 10% repeat(3, 1fr) 10%;grid-template-rows: 240px;font-size: 1.25rem;}.img1 {grid-column: 2/4;grid-row: 1/3;}.img2 {grid-column: 3/5;grid-row: 2/4;}.intro {visibility: hidden;opacity: 0;transition: opacity 1s ease-in-out;grid-column: 2/3;grid-row: 3/4;color: white;}.intro::first-letter {color: #903;float: left;font-family: 'Parisienne', cursive;font-size: 75px;line-height: 60px;padding-top: 4px;padding-right: 8px;padding-left: 3px;}.hero img {display: block;border-width: 0px;border-radius: 0px;filter: drop-shadow(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 2px 13px);}.hero {display: flex;justify-content: center;margin-bottom: 16px;}.show {visibility: visible;opacity: 1;}img {width: 100%;}.hero picture img {width: 100%;}.white {background-color: white;color: black;}.text2 {padding: 14px 4px;}@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {.intro {font-size: .75rem;grid-column: 1/2;}.section {grid-template-columns: 1fr;grid-template-rows: auto;padding: 0 8px;}.img1 {grid-column: auto;grid-row: auto;width: 93vw;}.img2 {grid-column: auto;grid-row: auto;width: 93vw;}img {width: 100%;}.hero picture img {width: 100%;}.text2 {padding: 14px 4px;}}@media only screen and (max-width: 800px) and (min-width: 601px) {.section1 .text {font-size: 1.5rem;}}@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {.section1 .text {font-size: .75rem;}}@media print,screen and (min-width: 40em) {.container img {object-fit: cover;height: 660px;}}
